      • countWordFreq

        public static WordStats countWordFreq(java.lang.String word,
                      java.nio.file.Path path)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Using a word and a text file this class returns a word's frequency and the size of the text file in words. such information is needed to calculate log likelihood but could also be very useful for other stuff.
